translations: n．乐观主义者：对未来持积极、乐观态度的人。
· Optimists believe that things will always work out for the best.
乐观主义者相信事情总会朝着最好的方向发展。

sentences.sentence: Optimists really do seem to look at the world through rose-coloured glasses.
sentences.translation: 乐观主义者看来确实是通过只看好的一面来观察世界。

sentences.sentence: Optimists point out that technological upheaval has benefited workers in the past.
sentences.translation: 乐观主义者指出，在过去技术变革曾使工人们受益。

sentences.sentence: When things go wrong, optimists act quickly, seeking advice from others and looking for solutions.
sentences.translation: 当出现问题时，乐观主义者会迅速采取行动，向他人寻求建议并寻找解决方案。
